FuncDef:
The igmp snooping send-query source-address command sets a source address contained in an IGMP Query message sent by a device.
The undo igmp snooping send-query source-address command restores the default configuration. The igmp snooping send-query source-address command sets a source address contained in an IGMP Query message sent by a device. The undo igmp snooping send-query source-address command restores the default configuration. By default, the source IP address contained in IGMP Query messages is 192.168.0.1.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a source IP address contained in an IGMP Query message.
This value is in dotted decimal notation.
